entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:32 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
